explains: n. 胶囊；小容器；太空舱，航天舱；蒴果，荚膜
wordGroup: in a capsule [口语]概括地说，简单扼要地讲
time capsule 时代文物密藏器
space capsule n. 太空舱；太空船

sentences.en: You are asked to swallow a capsule containing vitamin B.
sentences.cn: 你被要求吞下一颗含维生素B的胶囊。

sentences.en: A Russian space capsule is currently orbiting the Earth.
sentences.cn: 一个俄罗斯太空舱目前正环绕地球飞行。

sentences.en: Try and keep it in a time capsule.
sentences.cn: 试着把它放在时间胶囊里。
